com.betfair.cougar.transport.api

Interface RequestLogger


  • public interface RequestLogger

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void logAccess(HttpCommand command, com.betfair.cougar.api.ExecutionContext context, long bytesRead, long bytesWritten, javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType requestMediaType, javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType responseMediaType, com.betfair.cougar.api.ResponseCode responseCode)
      Creates a comma-delimited Access Log entry of the following format: received date-time, format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS request UUID path channel id response content type user IP address user country user agent response code process time in nanoseconds number of bytes read number of bytes written request media sub-type response media sub-type

    • Method Detail

      • logAccess

        void logAccess(HttpCommand command,
             com.betfair.cougar.api.ExecutionContext context,
             long bytesRead,
             long bytesWritten,
             javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType requestMediaType,
             javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType responseMediaType,
             com.betfair.cougar.api.ResponseCode responseCode)
        Creates a comma-delimited Access Log entry of the following format:
        1. received date-time, format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS
        2. request UUID
        3. path
        4. channel id
        5. response content type
        6. user IP address
        7. user country
        8. user agent
        9. response code
        10. process time in nanoseconds
        11. number of bytes read
        12. number of bytes written
        13. request media sub-type
        14. response media sub-type
        Parameters:
        command - Contains the request, response and timer
        context - Contains resolved channel and location details
        bytesRead - Number of bytes read from the request
        bytesWritten - Number of bytes written to the response
        requestMediaType -
        responseMediaType -
        responseCode -
